ProductInfo.Features:
26-inch widescreen LCD TV: Delivers 1366 x 768 resolution with over a million pixels for superb picture quality at 720p
Built-in ATSC digital/NTSC analog tuner: Receives conventional analog broadcasts and digital broadcasts
700:1 contrast ratio and 8-ms. response time: Ensures deeper blacks and brighter whites
HDMI, component video, S-video, composite video and audio connections: Accommodate DVD players, camcorders
6-watt stereo amplifier, two built-in speakers and coaxial digital audio output: Furnish rich audio and an interface
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo DP26647 26-inch Wide-Screen Flat Panel LCD HDTV with Digital Tuner
